message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000.
I understand Alice, but I still believe we can find a better middle ground. I would like to counteroffer at $8750.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8750. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer the product to you for $9200.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. I am willing to consider $9100 as a fair price for your product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9100. I'm willing to make another small concession and offer the product to you for $9250.
Considering our previous negotiations, I am willing to agree on a price of $9150 for your product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9150. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $9300.
After careful consideration, I am willing to agree on a final price of $9200 for your product.
